programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: Mr Sharma challenges the men of Gokuldham to tell one secret to their wives and see whether they keep it or not; Jethalal asks Bagha to install security cameras in the society compound.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The men of Gokuldham initiate the challenge of seeing whether their wives can keep secrets. Dr Hathi begins by telling his wife a secret of Bhide's and asking her to not share it with anyone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After getting vaccinated, Jethalal begins to feel pain in his arm. However, Champaklal refuses to take Jethalal's pain seriously.

programme.desc: Jethalal panics when he learns that a mouse has entered his godown overnight. Soon, he tries to find a solution to the problem.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal gets mad at Jethalal again for booking the wrong train tickets. Taarak and Anjali talk about their lives in Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal and Tapu help Jethalal fix the button of his shirt. Meanwhile, Bhide and Popatlal get into a fight with each other.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champak Chacha resolves the fight over Suvichar between Bhide and Popatlal. Later, Bhide goes to Sonu's college to give her food, but Sonu is not there.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After not seeing Sonu at college, Bhide learns from Goli that Sonu and Tapu are hanging out together, making him angry.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: To follow Sonu and Tapu to the theatre, Bhide takes Jethalal for a movie. After they arrive at the theatre, they try to find their kids but end up failing.
